Mantella: Yeah, But I wasn't far from the base. *Mantella walks up to
Quickstrike* Mantella: What was it that you had in mind for me? *Mantella

Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 11:21 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> Quickstrike:
>
>
>
>
> Hearing Mantella's voice in the room, as he was crouched by a backless
chair
> that was by a round table, banged his head on the bottom seat of it. He
> cried out in pain for a second and placed a multi-digited hand on top of
his
> head. He slowly stood up, collecting up a disk from the floor. He placed
it
> on the table near-by.
>
> Still holding his head, he said to her, "That was quick." He grabbed up
> three disks that was on the table and placed them under his armor behind
his
> back.
